attributes.action: National Lockdown for the foreseeable so we can Socially Distance at Verdansk
attributes.additional_details: Because we are a United Country and we can beat this virus
attributes.background: Full national lockdown would benefit everyone. Starting with the cases, cases should be harder to increase due to the amount of people staying inside and not coming into physical / close contact with others. It would also have a positive impact on the NHS as cases won’t be rising harshly like before

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government announced a national lockdown on 4 January 2021, and we're not sure what else you'd like the Government to do.
                
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156

Implement full 6-week lockdown including closure of shops and businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553580
